alert.note: Alert for Adams; Highland; Scioto (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 21 at 3:45PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF NORTHERN ADAMS, SOUTHEASTERN HIGHLAND AND WESTERN SCIOTO COUNTIES THROUGH 415 PM EDT... At 345 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was located over West Union, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Hail may cause minor damage to outdoor objects. Locations impacted include... West Union, Peebles, Rarden, Sinking Spring, Dunkinsville, Cedar Mills, Smoky Corners, Serpent Mound, Locust Grove and State Route 348 at State Route 125. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a sturdy building. To report hazardous weather conditions, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.
